title: Unity
description: A widely used game engine with useful tools to create cross platform 2D, 3D, VR and AR games with a huge community.

title: C#
description: A powerful, object-oriented programming language often used with Unity for scripting pretty much everything.

title: Aseprite
description: My pixel art tool of choice due to its powerful toolset for creating 2D sprites, animations, and graphics and large userbase.

title: Blender
description: An open-source 3D creation suite useful for modeling, rigging, animating, and rendering 3D graphics, useful for creating character models or environments for games.
